title: Matteo Panunzi
text:
Matteo Panunzi (<a href="Rome">Rome</a>, 12 May 1997) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
His usual position is as a <a href="Scrum-Half%20%28rugby%20union%29">Scrum-Half</a> and he currently plays for <a href="Petrarca%20Padova">Petrarca Padova</a> in <a href="Top12">Top12</a>.
For <a href="2015%E2%80%9316%20Pro12">2015–16 Pro12</a> season, he named like "Permit Player" for <a href="Zebre">Zebre</a>. 
In 2016 and 2017, Panunzi was named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 20</a> squad.
